name: NEAR Protocol
introduce:
NEAR is a sharded, proof-of-stake, layer-one blockchain that aims to incentivize a network of computers to operate a platform for developers to create and launch decentralized applications.
Central to NEAR Protocol’s design is the concept of sharding, a process that aims to split the network’s infrastructure into several segments in order for nodes to only have to handle a fraction of the network’s transactions. NEAR mainnet came online in August 2020.
